description: MCP bridge for inter-session communication between Claude Code instances
name: io.github.eaisdevelopment/cc-bridge-mcp-server

environmentVariables.description: Directory for state file and logs
environmentVariables.name: CC_BRIDGE_STATE_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Max characters in CLI message (0 = unlimited)
environmentVariables.name: CC_BRIDGE_CHAR_LIMIT

environmentVariables.description: Log verbosity: debug, info, warn, error
environmentVariables.name: CC_BRIDGE_LOG_LEVEL

environmentVariables.description: Path to the claude CLI executable
environmentVariables.name: CC_BRIDGE_CLAUDE_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Time in ms before a peer is flagged as stale (0 = disabled)
environmentVariables.name: CC_BRIDGE_STALE_TIMEOUT_MS

title: Claude Code Bridge from Essential AI Solutions (essentialai.uk)
